Headline: ලංකා කාර් එක හදන්න එක එක දේ කරන රනිල් (සිකුරාදා කාටූන්)

comments.comment: Nationalization at one time was the remedy for all illnesses and symptoms.But it was a total disaster.Politicians used govt institutions to give jobs to their henchmen.Cronyism and nepotism destroyed country's economy.Then privatization became the slogan of politicians who used it to remain in power,But then state enterprises were sold to cronies who again destroyed the country's economy.Now restructure is the' monthra' white robed rogues use to continue with their power games.It is clear that all these old actors whatever the theories they put forward from time to time,they are only meant for them to remain in power for some more time.
